publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5006 Mr Brian Monteith: Clydesdale Bank’s Sponsorship of the Scottish Premier League—That the Parliament congratulates Clydesdale Bank on its sponsorship of the Scottish Premier League beginning in July 2007, which represents a total investment of £8 million over four years with additional investments to extend the value of the sponsorship to staff, customers and communities, helping to provide a solid foundation for the league for the next four years and contributing to the potential for success by Scottish footballers, their clubs, the national team and the sport in general.

S2M-5006 Mr Brian Monteith: Clydesdale Bank’s Sponsorship of the Scottish Premier League—That the Parliament congratulates Clydesdale Bank on its sponsorship of the Scottish Premier League beginning in July 2007, which represents a total investment of £8 million over four years with additional investments to extend the value of the sponsorship to staff, customers and communities, helping to provide a solid foundation for the league for the next four years and contributing to the potential for success by Scottish footballers, their clubs, the national team and the sport in general.
S2M-5006 Clydesdale Bank’s Sponsorship of the Scottish Premier League (lodged on 24 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*
